channel.title: Making a stable 317 pking server, eco based! Rune-World
channel.description:
Welcome, [center]Rune-World[/center] hello Moparscape today I'm here asking for source coders and client coders to come and join my developing team [size=10pt] NEW STUFF THAT HAS BEEN ADDED ON DATE: SATURDAY 11 JUNE stuff we have added and done all dupe's fixed we made so you can stake now in duel arena because we fix the glitch ( thank you Owner Liam ans tylarotheog) 100% chaotic's 100% dragon claws with real emote 100% staff of light 100% rocktails 100%dark bow
[center][img]http://img155.imageshack.us/img155/592/itemsc.png[/img][/center] %85 jad we are working on this because it is broken ( thanks to owner liam he has almost fix it to 100% ) [/size] will be adding 100% pest control we have a new thing going on in this server so it not like the same old rsps we are having public vote for if we should make a pk-point system exchange.
[center][img]http://img291.imageshack.us/img291/9618/66637002.png[/img] [img]http://img291.imageshack.us/img291/9618/66637002.png[/img] [img]http://img713.imageshack.us/img713/8264/duelu.png[/img] [img]http://img713.imageshack.us/img713/8264/duelu.png[/img][/center]
how you should set you apply is like this Name: E-Mail: Msn: Experience: Age: Apply For:
server programmer 1/2 client programmer 0/2 forums developer 0/1 website maker 0/1 credits %45 Owner Liam %45 Tylar %10 moparscape tut
